name: Alienated (Distortality)
description:
The volume may be a bit loud, I apologize in advance.

Make sure to traverse the tips for an interactive tutorial!

Keyboard: 

Move - Arrows or WASD
Shoot - Spacebar
Shield - F

Controller:

Move - Left Stick
Shoot - R1/RB
Shield - Square/X

Gameplay Tips - 
Watch out when your ship catches fire! That means you're half health, and you'll die in one more hit!

Don't touch alien spaceships!

Some alien spaceships take multiple hits to explode.

Bash into enemies with the ULTRASHIELD!(TM)!

Creator - Alex Fisher

All music made by - levelplane from freesound.org
